Class AbstractDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • autumn.lang.internals.AbstractFunctor
      • autumn.lang.internals.AbstractTypedFunctor

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Delegate, Functor, TypedFunctor

    public abstract class AbstractDelegate
extends AbstractTypedFunctor
implements Delegate
    This class provides a partial implementation of the Delegate interface.
